Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the music in the movie 'Iron Man' released in 2008?
Options:
A. The film features a big band-style arrangement of the Iron Man theme song.
B. The Iron Man theme song was composed by John O'Brien and Rick Boston.
C. John O'Brien and Rick Boston are known for their collaboration with Jon Favreau.
D. The Iron Man theme song was performed by a famous pop artist.
